name: DEVILS HAND
description:
DevilsHand You are playing the devil. Create differences by clicking on actors/people.  Main goal: Make a lot of point/streak of social capital by creating as much rage as possible. The rage-meter ist on the left side (down). How you can act? Click-Action: Change >> Collisions

Of course the people can collide. How? 

Collision: Different persons - Fighting. Yeah!

If two different type of people collide, they fight like hell.
